languages.text: "Так вот как ты это видишь!" {n}— в голосе Ардженты прорезается нотка ярости, но она берет себя в руки.{/n} "Прошу прощения, Вольный Торговец. Я больше не потревожу вас подобными просьбами".

traits.locale_text: "Так вот как ты это видишь!" {n}— в голосе Ардженты прорезается нотка ярости, но она берет себя в руки.{/n} "Прошу прощения, Вольный Торговец. Я больше не потревожу вас подобными просьбами".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "So that's how you see it!" {n}Argenta's tone betrays her fury before she regains her composure.{/n} "My apologies, Rogue Trader. I won't trouble you with requests of this nature again."

traits.locale_text: "So that's how you see it!" {n}Argenta's tone betrays her fury before she regains her composure.{/n} "My apologies, Rogue Trader. I won't trouble you with requests of this nature again."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “原来你是这么想的！”{n}阿洁塔的语气中带着愤怒，之后她恢复了平静。{/n}“我很抱歉，行商浪人。我以后再也不会用这种请求来麻烦你了。”
languages.original_text: "So that's how you see it!" {n}Argenta's tone betrays her fury before she regains her composure.{/n} "My apologies, Rogue Trader. I won't trouble you with requests of this nature again."

traits.locale_text: “原来你是这么想的！”{n}阿洁塔的语气中带着愤怒，之后她恢复了平静。{/n}“我很抱歉，行商浪人。我以后再也不会用这种请求来麻烦你了。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «¡Conque así ve las cosas!». {n}El tono de Argenta refleja su furia, pero pronto recobra la compostura.{/n} «Lo lamento, Comerciante Independiente. No volveré a importunarle con peticiones de esta índole».
languages.original_text: "So that's how you see it!" {n}Argenta's tone betrays her fury before she regains her composure.{/n} "My apologies, Rogue Trader. I won't trouble you with requests of this nature again."

traits.locale_text: «¡Conque así ve las cosas!». {n}El tono de Argenta refleja su furia, pero pronto recobra la compostura.{/n} «Lo lamento, Comerciante Independiente. No volveré a importunarle con peticiones de esta índole».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「つまり、陛下はそのような見方をされるのですね！」{n}アルジェンタの声音は、裏切りの激情をにじませたのちに落ち着きを取り戻す。{/n}「申し訳ありません、自由開拓者。二度とこんな頼みをしてご迷惑はおかけしません」
languages.original_text: "So that's how you see it!" {n}Argenta's tone betrays her fury before she regains her composure.{/n} "My apologies, Rogue Trader. I won't trouble you with requests of this nature again."

traits.locale_text: 「つまり、陛下はそのような見方をされるのですね！」{n}アルジェンタの声音は、裏切りの激情をにじませたのちに落ち着きを取り戻す。{/n}「申し訳ありません、自由開拓者。二度とこんな頼みをしてご迷惑はおかけしません」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "So seht Ihr das also!" {n}Argentas Ton verrät ihre Wut, bevor sie die Fassung zurückgewinnt.{/n} "Verzeiht, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ich werde Euch nicht wieder mit derlei Bitten belästigen."
languages.original_text: "So that's how you see it!" {n}Argenta's tone betrays her fury before she regains her composure.{/n} "My apologies, Rogue Trader. I won't trouble you with requests of this nature again."

traits.locale_text: "So seht Ihr das also!" {n}Argentas Ton verrät ihre Wut, bevor sie die Fassung zurückgewinnt.{/n} "Verzeiht, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ich werde Euch nicht wieder mit derlei Bitten belästigen."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « C'est donc ainsi que vous voyez les choses ! » {n}Le ton d'Argenta trahit sa colère avant qu'elle ne se ressaisisse.{/n} « Toutes mes excuses, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Je ne vous soumettrai plus de requêtes de cette nature. »
languages.original_text: "So that's how you see it!" {n}Argenta's tone betrays her fury before she regains her composure.{/n} "My apologies, Rogue Trader. I won't trouble you with requests of this nature again."

traits.locale_text: « C'est donc ainsi que vous voyez les choses ! » {n}Le ton d'Argenta trahit sa colère avant qu'elle ne se ressaisisse.{/n} « Toutes mes excuses, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Je ne vous soumettrai plus de requêtes de cette nature. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Demek böyle düşünüyorsun!" {n}Argenta, bir anlığına öfkesine yenik düşse de kendini toparlıyor.{/n} "Mazur gör Hür Tacir. Bu tür taleplerle seni bir daha rahatsız etmeyeceğim."
languages.original_text: "So that's how you see it!" {n}Argenta's tone betrays her fury before she regains her composure.{/n} "My apologies, Rogue Trader. I won't trouble you with requests of this nature again."

traits.locale_text: "Demek böyle düşünüyorsun!" {n}Argenta, bir anlığına öfkesine yenik düşüyor ancak kendini toparlıyor.{/n} "Mazur gör Hür Tacir. Bu tür taleplerle seni bir daha rahatsız etmeyeceğim."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "So that's how you see it!" {n}Argenta's tone betrays her fury before she regains her composure.{/n} "My apologies, Rogue Trader. I won't trouble you with requests of this nature again."
